price: Vielleicht werden diejenigen, die ungläubig sind, wünschen, Muslime gewesen zu sein.
arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: rubamā yawaddu alladhīna kafarū law kānū mus'limīna
